anime.description: Our protagonist, Sumisora Tsubasa, just got a job as a new A&R person at Gandala Music, one of the biggest record companies in the business. Almost like it was a trap, as soon as she started with the company, she was put in charge of the idol unit, "B-PROJECT." Being in charge of B-PROJECT meant that she was in charge of the three groups, "Kitakore," "THRIVE," and "MooNs." Because this is her first job, things don`t go that well and she`s faced with various trouble and accidents. Be ambitious along with the ten BOYS who are all very different! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: BRAND NEW WORLD
Brand New World
Brand New World
episode.summary: After successfully completing their JAPAN Dome concert, the members of B-Project and Tsubasa keep busy pursuing their various jobs. Daikoku Productions president Daikoku Atsushi asks Tsubasa to bring B-Project to a certain location, and... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: DIE HARD
Die Hard
Die Hard
episode.summary: A joint concert featuring Brave Entertainment units KiLLER KiNG and THRIVE is planned to announce KiLLER KiNG joining B-PROJECT. Everyone is highly motivated, and practice for the concert seems to be progressing smoothly, but.. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: PARTY NIGHT
Party Night
Party Night
episode.summary: With the addition of KiLLER KiNG, B-PROJECT now has 14 members, but all of them are too busy with their respective jobs to meet as a group. The members decide to throw a welcoming party for KiLLER KiNG, but disaster strikes during the party!? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: TWO IS ONE
Two Is One
Two Is One
episode.summary: Kitakore are closely covered for the popular TV show "Fanatical Continent." Meanwhile, Kitakado and Korekuni receive individual job offers for a drama and commercial respectively. However, they both struggle to perform jobs rather disconnected from their normal image. Will they be able to finish their jobs and Fanatical Continent coverage without any incident...? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: KICK OFF
Kick Off
Kick Off
episode.summary: Ashu picks up two tickets to a major artist`s concert that Tsubasa happened to drop. Recalling how Tsubasa said those who work hard would be rewarded, Kitakore, THRIVE, and MooNs suddenly begin a battle for a concert date with Tsubasa... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: MOVING ON
Moving On
Moving On
episode.summary: Sekimura suddenly receives a message from his father that forces him to make a difficult decision. Sekimura agonizes over his choice, but he cannot disobey his father. His decision turns into a major event involving MooNs and B-PROJECT. Will MooNs and B-PROJECT be able to overcome this difficulty?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: MIRROR COMPLEX
Mirror Complex
Mirror Complex
episode.summary: Kitakore and MooNs are asked to appear on a music program produced by a TV station in Hokkaido. Due to their work schedules, Kitakado flies with four members of MooNs, while Masunaga and Korekuni fly together. Korekuni uses this opportunity to ask Masunaga how he feels, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: TRUE THING
True Thing
True Thing
episode.summary: B-Project 2 Episode 8 "TRUE THING" Yashamaru suddenly contacts Tsubasa and says some very troubling things, both for herself and B-PROJECT. Tsubasa can`t stop thinking about what Yashamaru said about her father and can`t concentrate on her work. Tsubasa asks the members of B-PROJECT, who seem to know something, about her father and his relationship with Yashamaru, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: SUMMER CAMP
Summer Camp
Summer Camp
episode.summary: Some members of B-Project find time in their busy schedules to go camping together. They have fun staying at a cottage belonging to Atsushi`s acquaintance, visiting a waterfall power spot, and struggling with cooking for themselves. However, the atmosphere turns sullen after a casual remark between the normally close Yuzuki and Haruhi... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: BRAVE ACTION
Brave Action
Brave Action
episode.summary: B-Project is filming for the movie "KING of CASTE." When Fudo learns his stuntman`s schedule doesn`t mesh with the filming schedule, he asks to do his own dangerous stunts himself. The other members worry for Fudo as he practices his stunts alone. Will they be able to finish filming without any incidents? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: TRAP AGAIN
Trap Again
Trap Again
episode.summary: B-PROJECT works hard at their lessons in preparation for their first concert at the Japan DOME as a 14-man squad. With production planning going smoothly as well, everyone around them is becoming increasingly excited. Preparations for the day of the concert are progressing steadily, but while Kitakado, Kaneshiro, Masunaga, and Fudo are announcing the concert on live TV, they receive a shocking piece of information... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: CLIMAX EMOTION
Climax Emotion
Climax Emotion
episode.summary: B-Project 2 Episode 12 "CLIMAX EMOTION" Thanks to Yashamaru`s help, B-PROJECT is able to hold a countdown concert after all. The members are eager to put on the best possible performance no matter the circumstances, but the problems keep piling up. B-PROJECT and Tsubasa work together to resolve them one by one. However, when new problems are added to the mix, the concert itself is threatened again... Source: crunchyroll
